reviews.name: Redline (Blu-ray) (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: Futuristic instant classic! If you like any sort of races, sci-fi and anime then this is a must see movie. Prepare yourself for a comic-like distorted animation filled will rich color visualizations and extreme perspective view. The story line itself is out of this world, literally. Watch how one man races his custom TRANSAM against other insanely modified vehicles. This movie has more into it than just the race itself. Its the race of universe! ENJOY!!!
reviews.title: Anime Instant Classic!

reviews.name: Redline (Blu-ray) (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: I bought this based on an internet trailer and was not in the least disappointed. This is hand drawn anime at it's finest.
reviews.title: Eyepopping

reviews.name: Redline (Blu-ray) (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: If Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann and death race were to have a baby. This would be it. Intense fast paced action, stunning animation, and an awesome music score. For this price there's no reason to pass it up.
reviews.title: Well worth the watch.
